column4: i installed ubuntu and at the end of the basic installation the installer tell me it needs additional language packages
ant that it is going to fiwnload these
how can i add this packages ?
i dont know which packages are needed
how can i chekc if or if not ?
say yes and don't worry about it? :-) If it can't download them, then it can't download them ...
it tells me that i need addition language packages and that it is going to download these now ( it is queestioning me )

the question's there so that if you're installing a thousand machines with CDs that don't have the right language-support-* on them, it won't kill your net connection as they all simultaneously go off to mirrors
so how can i see if he took the packages from cd ? maybe
it'll be obvious if not, because it will spend time downloading and show a progress meter
right at the very end of the installation
